text: Statistical differences were analyzed using the Student ' s t - test for all analysis , except of 3C and 3D dose - dependent test in Figures 4B , D with Pearson correlation coefficient . Data are presented as means and standard deviations ( SD ) . * P - values of < 0 . 05 were considered statistically significant .
